Title: Escape from the Fallen Kingdom
Credits: A story written and coded by Aiden Waldorf (atwaldor@ucsc.edu).
CapturedMessage: Without protection, you were overwhelmed and captured by enemy forces as the castle fell into chaos.

ConditionalMessages.Message: Velvet curtains blow in the wind as distant shouts echo through the halls. You realize this is no longer a sanctuary as the sound of armored boots echo through the halls — loyal guards rally to your call.

Shelves reach the vaulted ceiling, packed with forbidden histories. You shudder at the thought of all this knowledge turning to ash at the hands of your invaders. A weathered note slips from between the pages of the tome: “The old kings of the castle harbor a key, used by sneaky servants and spies.”
Portraits of kings and queens line the shadowed corridor. Your hand brushes a hidden compartment beneath a faded portrait of your grandfather. Inside lies a cold iron key — the way out.
The courtyard lies eerily still — the enemy patrol has been vanquished.
Steel glints in the dim light. Racks of weapons and armor stand ready for their last stand. You rally the last remaining soldiers — battered but ready to fight for their prince.

Choice.Text: Slip out through the hidden tunnel

loseGuards.winText: Victory comes at a cost — some of your guards lie wounded, but the path is clear.
loseGuards.loseText: Your last line of defense is gone — the guards are defeated.

Royal Chambers.Body: Velvet curtains blow in the wind as distant shouts echo through the halls. This is your sanctuary no longer — the Royal Chambers are the start of your flight. Looking out the window, you see the enemy forces gathering below, the flaming remains of your family's kingdom at their backs.

Choices.Text: Hurry to the Hall of Ancestors

Hall of Ancestors.Body: Portraits of kings and queens line the shadowed corridor. Secrets whisper from every frame — this is the Hall of Ancestors. You can feel the weight of their legacy pressing down on you, urging you to survive.

Throne Room.Body: Once a seat of power, now left empty. The sounds of soldiers yelling and swords clashing draw nearer with each breath.

Choices.Text: Back to the Hall of Ancestors

Grand Archives.Body: Shelves reach the vaulted ceiling, packed with forbidden histories. You shudder at the thought of all this knowledge turning to ash at the hands of your invaders. A single tome lies suspiciously untouched on a pedestal.

Outdoor Courtyard.Body: Moonlight reveals enemy silhouettes pacing among broken fountains and scattered leaves. The Outdoor Courtyard is a gauntlet.

stealthCheck.passText: You move silently around the fountain, slipping past the patrolling guards unnoticed.
stealthCheck.failText: A twig snaps. Shouts ring out. Your guards' armor clatters. You’re forced to fight your way through the courtyard, but you make it.

stealthCheck.failText: A twig snaps. Shouts ring out. Your guards' armor clatters. You’re forced to fight your way through the courtyard, but you survive.

Outdoor Courtyard.clearText: The courtyard lies eerily still — the enemy patrol has been vanquished.

Servants’ Quarters.Body: The scent of old stew lingers in these narrow halls — the forgotten paths of servants and spies alike. You wonder if they left any secrets hidden in the room.

Armory.Body: Steel glints in the dim light. Racks of weapons and armor stand ready for their last stand.

Kitchen.Body: The warmth of the hearth has faded. Knives glisten on the counter — this is the Kitchen, and perhaps your last turn before escape.

Garden.Body: Moonlit hedges cast long shadows as smoke billows over the treeline. This quiet garden could be your safest way out — or your grave.

stealthCheck.passText: You move silently beneath the hedges, slipping past the final guards unnoticed.
stealthCheck.failText: A twig snaps. Shouts ring out. Your guards' armor clatters. You’re forced to fight your way through the garden gate.

Garden.clearText: The garden lies eerily still — the enemy patrol has been vanquished.

Stable Yard.Body: The scent of hay and panic fills the air. War horses neigh in fear — this may be your last gallop to freedom, but the enemy patrol stands in your way.

loseGuards.winText: Your guards charge ahead, clearing a bloody path. You ride out with them under a storm of arrows.
loseGuards.loseText: Your guards charge ahead, clearing a bloody path. They sacrifice themselves to allow you to slip away under a storm of arrows.

Stable Yard.clearText: The scent of hay and panic fills the air. The stables lie eerily still — the enemy patrol has been vanquished.

City Outskirts.Body: The castle smolders behind you. Whether by blade, key, or silence — you have escaped. What becomes of the kingdom now lies in fate’s hands.
